sentences.english: Along with the extending of time, the contact toxicity of A. wormwood extracts on drosophila increased.
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的延长，艾草提取液对果蝇的触杀效果增强。

sentences.english: A nonfurry alternative was the fruit fly.
sentences.chinese: 另一种不长毛的替代物是果蝇。

sentences.english: If I can fruit fly, I 'sword Hill song I used to fly EGA to understand martial arts.
sentences.chinese: 如果我能果蝇，我的歌，我用剑山飞特惠了解武术。

sentences.english: In this thesis, we define a coordinate system for the Drosophila brain.
sentences.chinese: 在这篇论文里，我们为果蝇脑定义一个座标系统。

sentences.english: Interactive effects of temperature and geography on emigration behavior of Drosophila melanogaster.
sentences.chinese: 交互影响的温度和地理的移民行为的果蝇。

sentences.english: And lately there has been a lot of activity in the fruit-fly world.
sentences.chinese: 果蝇多数活动在水果的世界里。

sentences.english: Results The oligosaccharide could significantly increase the hatching rate and sexual vitality.
sentences.chinese: 结果巴戟天低聚糖能显著提高果蝇性活力和羽化率。

sentences.english: Repeated doses of booze led male flies to start courting other males.
sentences.chinese: 重复摄入酒精导致雄性果蝇开始向其他同行“求爱”。

sentences.english: My families believe in Buddhism. So I feel guilty of killing innocent flies.
sentences.chinese: 我们家人信佛，所以我杀果蝇心里很内疚。

sentences.english: The relation between B chromosomes and the vitality of Drosophila albomicans were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了钮额果蝇的生活力和B染色体的关系。

sentences.english: They’re also continuing their pioneering research into flying decapitated fruit flies.
sentences.chinese: 他们还继续进行果蝇斩首的开创性研究。

sentences.english: It indicated that the quantitative character is the result of the interaction of genotype and environment.
sentences.chinese: 说明果蝇的发生量是由基因型和环境交互作用的结果。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the studies advances of P transposable element in Drosophila .
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了果蝇P转座因子的一些研究进展。

sentences.english: They found that starving fruit flies spent more time awake than satiated flies did.
sentences.chinese: 他们发现，饥饿的果蝇比吃饱的果蝇清醒的时间长。

sentences.english: They found that starving fruit flies spent more time awake than satiated flies did.
sentences.chinese: 他们发现，饥饿的果蝇比吃饱的果蝇清醒的时间长。

sentences.english: We don't feel comfortable saying the fruit fly's dead.
sentences.chinese: 我们不会喜欢说果蝇死了。

definition: imago (adult, sexually mature insect, the final stage of its development)
parthenogenesis (biol. a female reproducing without fertilization)
